name: ios-inner-height
description: Retrieve a consistent, accurate `window.innerHeight` measurement from iOS
author: Tyler Peterson <tylerjpeterson@gmail.com>

scripts.coverage: mkdir -p coverage && browserify test/spec/test.js -p tape-istanbul/plugin | tape-run | tape-istanbul --output coverage/coverage.json && npm run report
scripts.report: istanbul report --root coverage lcov && open coverage/lcov-report/index.html
scripts.lint: xo ./index.js --no-esnext || true && xo ./test/spec/test.js || true && xo ./test/examples/js/demo.js --no-esnext || true
